          "last_edited_by": "bb760e2d-d679-4b64-b2a9-03005b21870a",

          "last_edited_time": 1551929965013,
          "parent_id": "62242fb1-d3d5-41a5-81bc-8bb8f3180e48",
          "parent_table": "block",
          "properties": {
            "language": [["Plain Text"]],
            "title": [
              [
                "$ { pipedata=$(<mypipe) && echo \"$pipedata\"; } &\n$ ls >mypipe \n# Output: Prints the output of ls directly on screen \n\nMind that the variable `$pipedata` is not available for usage in the main terminal / main shell since the use of `&` invokes a subshell and `$pipedata` was only available in this subshell."
              ]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "code",
          "version": 5
        }
      },
      "62242fb1-d3d5-41a5-81bc-8bb8f3180e48": {
        "role": "comment_only",
        "value": {
